list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: being reserved or having or showing nervousness or timidity in the company of other people.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was pretty shy at school
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi khá nhút nhát ở trường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a plant) not bearing flowers or fruit well or prolifically.
(especially of a horse) start suddenly aside in fright at an object, noise, or movement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their horses shied at the unfamiliar sight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngựa của họ bị cản trở trong tầm nhìn xa lạ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fling or throw (something) at a target.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he tore the glasses off and shied them at her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta xé kính và khiến chúng bị cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden startled movement, especially of a frightened horse.
an act of flinging or throwing something at a target.
